[[MINIX]] | platform = | language = | status = | genre = [[Window manager]] | license = [[MIT License|MIT]] | website = http://www.fluxbox.org }} '''Fluxbox''' is a [[stacking window manager]] for the [[X Window System]], which started as a [[fork (software)|fork]] of [[Blackbox]] 0.61.1, with the same aim to be lightweight. Its [[user interface]] has only a [[taskbar]], a [[Popup menu|pop-up menu]] accessible by right-clicking on the desktop, and minimal support for graphical [[icon (computing)|icons]]. All basic configurations are controlled by [[text file]]s, including the construction of menus and the mapping of keybindings.{{cite web|url= http://www.linux.org/lessons/short/fluxbox/index.html |title= Using the Fluxbox Window Manager |publisher= Linux Online Inc. |first= Michael J.|last= Jordan }} Fluxbox has high compliance to the [[Extended Window Manager Hints]] specification.{{cite web|url= http://fluxbox.sourceforge.net/docs/ewmh-support.html |title= Fluxbox EWMH Support |accessdate= 2009-09-09 }} Fluxbox can show some [[eye candy]]: colors, gradients, borders, and several other basic appearance attributes can be specified. Recent versions support rounded corners and graphical elements. Effects managers such as xcompmgr, cairo-compmgr and transset-df (deprecated) can add true transparency to desktop elements and windows. Enhancements can also be provided by using iDesk or fbdesk, or the [[ROX Desktop]]. Fluxbox also has several features Blackbox lacks, including [[Tabbed document interface|tabbed windows]] and a configurable titlebar.[http://fluxbox-wiki.org/index.php/Eye_candy Eye candy - Fluxbox-wiki] Because of its small memory footprint and quick loading time, Fluxbox is popular in many [[Live CD]]s such as [[Knoppix STD]] and [[GParted]]. It was the default window manager of [[Damn Small Linux]] and [http://antix.mepis.com/index.php/Main_Page antiX], but was replaced with [[JWM]] in 2007 and 2009 respectively. It is currently the default window manager of PCFluxboxOS, a remaster of [[PCLinuxOS]], and of [[Linux Mint]] Fluxbox CE. [[Fluxbuntu]], an [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] derivative with lightweight applications, was released in October 2007.[http://fluxbuntu.org/ Fluxbuntu Home] == Features == Features of the Fluxbox window manager include: * Right-clicking on the desktop gives a root menu * Customizable root menu * Support for wallpaper * Running applications appear in a [[taskbar]] * Desktop shortcuts * Support for desktop themes == Customization == Customization is done by editing configuration files in the .fluxbox subdirectory in the user's home directory. Keyboard shortcuts are stored in the ~/.fluxbox/keys file, menu layout is in the ~/.fluxbox/menu file, everything that's run at startup is kept in the ~/.fluxbox/startup file, and the fluxbox configuration file is held at ~/.fluxbox/init. == Useful tools == * [http://useperl.ru/ipager/index.en.html IPager] : A lightweight pager. * [http://svn.berlios.de/viewcvs/*checkout*/fluxbox/trunk/util/fbsetbg?rev=3908 Fbsetbg] : Set wallpaper for Fluxbox. * [http://fluxspace.sourceforge.net/ FluxSpace] : A window manager and workspace enhancer and integrator. * [http://benedict.isomedia.com/homes/stevencooper/projects/fluxter.html Fluxter] : A slit pager. == See also == {{Portal|Free software}} * [[Blackbox]] * [[Openbox]] * [[Comparison of X window managers]] ==References== {{Reflist}} * {{cite book | first1=Robert | last1=Shingledecker | first2=John | last2=Andrews | first3=Chris | last3=Negus | year=2007 | title=The Official Damn Small Linux Book: The Tiny Adaptable Linux That Runs on Anything }} ==External links== * [http://www.fluxbox.org/ fluxbox.org] Official website * [http://old.fluxbox.org/ .:F L U X B O X:. - Welcome to fluxbox] Old website * [http://fluxbox-wiki.org/index.php/Fluxbox-wiki Fluxbox-wiki] Fluxbox official wiki * [irc://irc.freenode.net/fluxbox #fluxbox] on freenode {{X desktop environments and window managers}} {{FOSS}} [[Category:Free software programmed in C++]] [[Category:Free X window managers]] [[Category:Software using the MIT license]] [[Category:Software forks]] [[ar:ÙÙÙØ³ Ø¨ÙÙØ³]] [[bar:Fluxbox]] [[ca:Fluxbox]] [[cs:Fluxbox]] [[de:Fluxbox]] [[et:Fluxbox]] [[es:Fluxbox]] [[eu:Fluxbox]] [[fr:Fluxbox]] [[gl:Fluxbox]] [[ko:íë­ì¤ë°ì¤]] [[it:Fluxbox]] [[nl:Fluxbox]] [[ja:Fluxbox]] [[no:Fluxbox]] [[nn:Fluxbox]] [[pl:Fluxbox]] [[pt:FluxBox]] [[ro:Fluxbox]] [[ru:Fluxbox]] [[simple:Fluxbox]] [[sk:Fluxbox]] [[fi:Fluxbox]] [[sv:Fluxbox]] [[tr:Fluxbox]] [[zh:Fluxbox]]
